name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
summary: An open-world adventure game where players explore Hyrule, solve puzzles, and defeat enemies to save the kingdom.

name: Among Us
summary: Players work together on a spaceship to complete tasks, while impostors secretly try to eliminate them.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
summary: A futuristic RPG set in Night City with an ambitious open-world experience, criticized for bugs at launch.

name: I AM YOUR BEAST
summary: Hunt the military-industrial complex across stylish comic book micro-sandboxes in this fast-paced covert revenge thriller FPS from the developers of El Paso, Elsewhere.

name: God of War: Ragnarok
summary: Kratos and Atreus journey through Norse mythology to face gods and monsters in an emotionally charged narrative.

name: Elden Ring
summary: A vast open-world RPG featuring challenging combat, intricate lore, and freedom to explore the Lands Between.

name: Hollow Knight
summary: Explore the mysterious, insect-infested world of Hallownest in this challenging and beautifully animated platformer.

name: FIFA 23
summary: The latest entry in the FIFA series, offering realistic gameplay, updated teams, and enhanced graphics.

name: Resident Evil Village
summary: Ethan Winters ventures into a mysterious village to rescue his daughter, facing terrifying creatures and uncovering dark secrets.

name: Stardew Valley
summary: Manage your farm, build relationships, and explore the town in this charming life-simulation RPG.

name: Death Stranding
summary: Play as Sam Porter Bridges, connecting isolated cities in a post-apocalyptic America while facing mysterious phenomena.

name: Overwatch 2
summary: Team-based shooter featuring iconic heroes, objective-focused gameplay, and dynamic multiplayer modes.

name: Hades
summary: Battle your way out of the Underworld in this fast-paced roguelike, with rich storytelling and Greek mythology themes.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
summary: As Geralt of Rivia, hunt monsters, navigate political intrigue, and make choices that shape the world.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
summary: Step into the boots of Arthur Morgan and experience the decline of the Wild West through loyalty, survival, and choice.

name: Dark Souls III
summary: A brutal and rewarding journey through a dark, decaying world filled with deadly enemies and cryptic lore.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
summary: Explore Night City as V, a mercenary navigating a futuristic dystopia filled with corporations, gangs, and cybernetic enhancements.

name: Elden Ring
summary: An expansive open world co-created with George R.R. Martin, filled with danger, mystery, and freedom of exploration.

name: God of War (2018)
summary: Kratos and his son Atreus journey through Norse realms, battling gods and monsters while confronting their past.

name: Horizon Forbidden West
summary: Join Aloy as she explores distant lands and uncovers mysteries in a post-apocalyptic world dominated by robotic creatures.

name: Cuphead
summary: A visually stunning run-and-gun platformer inspired by 1930s cartoons with challenging boss fights.

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
summary: A samurai-themed action game with precise combat, stealth mechanics, and a gripping story of vengeance.

name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
summary: Build and customize your island paradise while interacting with charming villagers and visiting friends’ islands.

name: Metroid Dread
summary: Join Samus Aran as she explores a dangerous planet full of hostile creatures in this challenging and beautifully animated platformer.

name: Ghost of Tsushima
summary: Explore feudal Japan as a samurai defending his homeland, with beautiful landscapes and immersive combat.

name: The Last of Us Part II
summary: Ellie’s journey of revenge in a post-apocalyptic United States delivers emotionally charged storytelling and intense combat.

name: Monster Hunter Rise
summary: Hunt massive monsters solo or with friends, crafting gear and exploring varied biomes in this epic action RPG.

name: Splatoon 3
summary: An ink-based team shooter with fast-paced multiplayer battles and colorful, imaginative arenas.

name: Bayonetta 3
summary: Play as the witch Bayonetta in a stylish, over-the-top hack-and-slash adventure filled with combat and flair.

name: The Crew Motorfest
summary: The Crew Motorfest is a 2023 racing video game developed by Ubisoft Ivory Tower and published by Ubisoft for the PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Windows, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S.
